summary: Updated scripts for Roosters at Dawn. Optional updated esp for USLEEP compatibility.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17257/?]Roosters at Dawn[/url] is a great mod which causes roosters to crow at dawn. Unfortunately, the scripts would cause some spam in your papyrus logs. Since no one else has done it, I went ahead and updated the scripts to fix the issues.

REQUIREMENTS
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17257/?]Roosters At Dawn[/url] Yes, the original is required. I did not package any of the sounds in my downloads so you will still need [center][/center]the original.

NOTES
-If you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23771/]skyBirds [/url]and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17723/?]Birds of Skyrim[/url] together, you do not need to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17257/]Roosters at Dawn[/url] or this patch. They include [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17257/]Roosters At Dawn's[/url] features. [s]SkyBirds can cause [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/wiki/dangerous_mods_masterlist]save bloat[/url] over time, so be warned.[/s] Skybirds is now safe to use.

INSTALLATION
-Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17257/?]Roosters At Dawn[/url]
-Install my scripts.Â 
-(OPTIONAL)Install my esp replacer if you use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]

CHANGES
v1.0 (No Version change)
-Changed USKP patch to USLEEP patch. Carried over more changes.
-No changes to scripts.

CREDITS
-schmidte for the original mod
-steve40 whose post [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/732051-fxdustdroprandomscript-errors-fixed/]here [/url]helped me fix the scripts
author: NavLM
